name: GATE (Alderex)
description:
GATE provides a way to play tabletop RPGs with your friends remotely.  The game is geared towards D&D specifically, including SRD content for players and DMs.

Draw on the map, drop in tokens, chat and play!

To make automated rolls, simply type in "/roll [num of dice]d[num of sides]" - like /roll 6d4

To add your own custom token artwork, simply add the images to the StreamingAssets folder, located in the GATE_Data folder.  Make sure each player has the artwork in their own folders, it's not automatically synced.
